item.title: Free Cybersecurity Certification by ISC2
item.description: Who doesnt like free stuff? specially, when it can increase your chances of increasing your salary and improving your resume. If you see yourself in cybersecurity industry and have the passion and drive to enter a demanding and rewarding field, or even if you are getting started, please take advantage of this opportunity. (ISC)2 is the world’s largest nonprofit association of certified cybersecurity professionals and has commited to offer FREE certification in Cybersecurity (CC).

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Greeting y’all! Im Kevin and this is my personal webpage. I don’t need to introduce myself in this post since the homepage should have more than enough info about me. Here, I post about interesting stuff that I find in my daily journey, not only about tech but anything that draws my attention. Here you can find about: Tech! Outdoors adventures Finance Machine Learning Cybersecurity Systems Admin DevOps Hacking Cryptocurrency Blockchain If there is something you want me to write about send me an email at hello at [this domain] (yes, this is need to prevent spam, I’ll see if it is effective).
